text:
An SVG with an <image> tag pointing to a 1 bpp (black&white) PNG file containing
a bKGD chunk will generate the following exception in the SVG Rasterizer (batik
1.5.1):

Converting bKGDtest.svg to bKGDtest.png ... java.lang.IllegalArgumentException:
Color parameter outside of expected range: Red Green Blue
        at java.awt.Color.testColorValueRange(Color.java:285)
        at java.awt.Color.<init>(Color.java:361)
        at java.awt.Color.<init>(Color.java:340)
        at org.apache.batik.ext.awt.image.codec.PNGRed.parse_bKGD_chunk(Unknown
Source)
        at org.apache.batik.ext.awt.image.codec.PNGRed.<init>(Unknown Source)
        at org.apache.batik.ext.awt.image.spi.PNGRegistryEntry$1.run(Unknown Source)
... success
creator: jdemeyer@cage.ugent.be
